---
title: "reports from shiny"
author : Rakesh Poduval `r Sys.Date()`
output: html_document
params:
  n: NA
---

A plot of `n` = `r params$n` random points.

```{r, echo = F,  message = F, warning = F}
plot(x = rnorm(params$n), 
         y = log(rnorm(params$n)),
         xlab = 'n',
         ylab = 'log(n)',
         main = 'n vs. long(n)',
         col = 'blue')
```
